page.title: 06HOW TOURISM AFFECTS ST.IVES.
page.content:
Two{differing views}about the effects of tourism:_
"Once the town was{"alive"}all year round with local stores catering for the locals.Now much of the town is {"dead"}in winter with many shops that cater only for tourists,closing when the season ends.There are many{"up {country"}folk in the town and many holiday lets and flats."
"In the summer, the town is full and there is lots of{fun}and laughter.With all these people,the atmosphere is a happy one. I like the visitors coming down because it gives me{work}and brings the town to{life.}"
